items.summary:
Today could be a big day for the Amazon Devices team as it is set to take the stage in NYC to reveal what appears to be the next-generation of Echo devices (likely some Kindle and Fire TV action too). While much of its current lineup of Echo smart speakers and devices, as well as some Kindles and the Fire TV Sticks are already seeing as much as 50% price drops as part of the early Prime Big Deals Days sale, the next-generation models appear to be on the horizon, and we will know all about them this morning.

But the idea lands, and beneath the hype, it is genuinely exciting — […]

items.title: Secure a rare deal on Samsung’s official steel 3-in-1 Wireless Charging Station, now back at $100 Amazon all-time low (Reg. $150)
items.summary:
Amazon is giving folks another rare chance to secure the official Samsung 3-in-1 Wireless Charging Station down at the $99.99 shipped all-time low. Regularly $150, and currently fetching as much straight from Samsung, this is only the second time we have caught a proper deal on this model. While Amazon’s offer is currently listed as “Temporarily out of stock,” you can still secure one at the discounted rate. These official steel Samsung charging stands have gone in and out of stock at Amazon more than a few times, and have been hard to come by on sale – it might be a good idea to secure one while you can.

items.summary:
The Information:
OpenAI's financial disclosures to investors suggest it generated ~$4.3B in H1 2025 revenue, 16% more than all of 2024, and burned $2.5B, largely due to R&D  —  OpenAI generated around $4.3 billion in revenue in the first half of 2025, about 16% more than it generated all of last year, according to financial disclosures to shareholders.

items.title: TM opens Morib Cable Landing Station, first open CLS along Straits of Malacca
items.summary: Telekom Malaysia (TM)’s wholesale arm, TM Global, has completed its fifth cable landing station (CLS) in Morib, Selangor. The Morib CLS is Malaysia’s first open cable landing station along the Straits of Malacca, designed to strengthen international connectivity while enhancing route diversity and reducing latency for regional traffic flows. Spanning 7,000 square feet, the Morib […]

NetBlocks: Afghanistan is experiencing a “total internet blackout” as the Taliban imposes a telecom shutdown; an official says it will last until further notice  —  Afghanistan's main airport is at a standstill as the country grapples with the fallout of a nationwide internet shutdown imposed by the Taliban government.

South Korean AI chip maker Rebellions raised a $250M Series C at a $1.4B valuation; Arm joined the round as a strategic partner  —  Rebellions Inc. raised $250 million from investors including Arm Holdings Plc to mass produce its chip and speed up product development in a competitive AI market.

items.title: California Governor Newsom signs landmark AI safety bill SB 53
items.summary: SB 53 requires large AI labs – including OpenAI, Anthropic, Meta, and Google DeepMind – to be transparent about safety protocols. It also ensures whistleblower protections for employees at those companies.

While we routinely cover surge protector markdowns around here for less, some folks prefer to spend a bit more and opt for something from the likes of Anker and others. If you’re in that boat, then this deal is for you. This unit boasts a total of 12 AC outlets, two USB-A, and one 20W Type-C, all of which are backed by 2,100J surge protection.

Today at Amazon we are tracking a relatively rare chance to save on the popular Breville Smart Grinder Pro to help you do just that – a few different colors are back at the lowest price of the year on Amazon right now.

Delamu Clear Under-Sink Pull-Out Organizers (2-pack)

Buy for $25.50 (Reg. $40)

What we love

Unlike a lot of the under-sink organizers we come across, these feature a straight forward setup process that doesn’t require screws or adhesive strips. The feet have an anti-slip pad that helps keep them locked in place while you pull the drawers in and out.

items.title: Stuck with USB-A? Make the most of it with this retractable 3-in-1 cable down at $9.50 (Save 27%)
items.summary:
LISEN 3-in-1 Retractable USB Cable

Buy for $9.50 (Reg. $13)

What we love

Some big ticket products have USB-A ports and you can’t really do much about it. You can use an adapter to switch it to USB-C, but you can also pick up a 3-in-1 cable like this too. Once plugged in you’ll have micro USB, Type-C, and Lightning cables at your disposal. I like the retractable design here that allows it to be small and compact until you need it.
